thread.title: The Oak Grill will close on Jan. 27, several weeks before Macy's in downtown Minneapolis
thread.title_full: The Oak Grill will close on Jan. 27, several weeks before Macy's in downtown Minneapolis

title: The Oak Grill will close on Jan. 27, several weeks before Macy's in downtown Minneapolis
text: With the closing of Macy’s in downtown Minneapolis in March, diners will no doubt want to make a pilgrimage to the building’s 12th floor and pay their respects to the 69-year-old Oak Grill. Plan ahead and move quickly, because the restaurant is closing for good on Jan. 27. When Macy’s pulled the plug on its downtown St. Paul store in 2013, reservations quickly filled for that store’s River Room restaurant. Oak Grill reservations can be made at opentable.com; the restaurant does not accept reservations over the phone. The adjacent Skyroom restaurant serves weekday lunch on a first-come, first-serve basis. @RickNelsonStrib
